plugins.Name: Folder
plugins.Description: Navigates folders starting from a drive letter 'C:\' or from the user home '~'.
plugins.Author: qianlifeng

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Disable non-indexed files warning
Show a dialog to confirm system commands
Use localized system commands instead of English ones
Reduce the priority of 'IP' and 'MAC' results to improve the order in the global results
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: With this setting enabled, you have to type more characters to find the results.

plugins.Name: Time and Date
plugins.Description: Provides time and date values for the system time or a custom time stamp (Examples: 'day', 'day::5/30/2022', 'time::11:10:10 PM', 'calendar week::5/30/2022')
plugins.Author: htcfreek

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show only 'Time', 'Date' and 'Now' result on global queries
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Regardless of this setting, for global queries the first word of the query has to be a complete match.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show time with seconds
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This setting applies to the 'Time' and 'Now' result.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show date with weekday and name of month
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This setting applies to the 'Date' and 'Now' result.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Hide 'Invalid number input' error message on global queries

plugins.Name: Time zone
plugins.Description: Gets the the current time of a time zone
plugins.Author: TobiasSekan

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show time zone names
Show time names
Show military time zone names

plugins.Name: Unit Converter
plugins.Description: Provides unit conversion (e.g. 10 ft in m).
plugins.Author: ThiefZero

plugins.Name: URI Handler
plugins.Description: Opens URLs and UNC network shares.
plugins.Author: Microsoft

plugins.Name: Visual Studio Code Workspaces
plugins.Description: Opens workspaces, remote machines (SSH or Codespaces) and containers, previously opened in VS Code.
plugins.Author: ricardosantos9521

plugins.Name: Web Search
plugins.Description: Search the web with your default search engine.
plugins.Author: cyberrex5

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Don't include in global results on queries that are URIs

plugins.Name: Windows settings
plugins.Description: Plugin to search for Windows settings
plugins.Author: TobiasSekan

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Open profiles in a new tab
Show hidden profiles
Show only results from visible desktop
Show process id in the subtitle
Show desktop name in the subtitle
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This information is only shown in subtitle and tool tip, if you have at least two desktops.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Request confirmation when killing a process
Kill process and its child processes
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Be careful when activating this. Killing the whole process tree can lead to problematic application crashes.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Stay open after closing windows and killing processes
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This feature won't work if the kill process confirmation is enabled.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Hide "kill process" button if additional permissions required
Hide Explorer process information
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This message is only shown when searching with a direct activation command.
